subtitle.heading: Terms & Conditions
subtitle.para: FOLLOWME supports the connections of more than 3,000 Brokers. You can connect to an existing trading account,  by searching the Broker’s MT4 server, entering the trading account login and password on the Connect Account page.  You can also create a new trading account of a top Broker on FOLLOWME. Accounts need to be connected to FOLLOWM   after successful creation.
